title: Are some champions removed from TFT?
body: I haven't played TFT in a while and saw it got preseason worth of changes. I asked my friend what some of the changes were and he said that some champions like Blitz and Vi got removed from the game. I've played a few games of TFT and can't find them. Is this true that they got removed? If so what other champions got removed?

replies.body: Other than absolute basics, the entire game got an overhaul for the new set. Most of the old synergies and champions are gone.
